original: This is outlandish.

original: You can't just not do your job.

original: He hasn't lit any candles in his room.

original: You can't just come in here and start ordering people around.

original: The check bounced.

original: The first step in mastering your emotions is mastering the skill of interoception.

original: Whatever doesn't kill us only makes us stronger.

original: Sweating, he mopped his brow with his tie.
translated: Il suait et il s'est essuyé le front avec sa cravate.

original: I'll gladly pay him something for the accommodation.
translated: Je serai heureux de lui payer quelque chose pour le logement.

original: Ignore him; he's just an annoying kid who wants attention.

original: Don't be so outraged.

original: When should I return the car?

original: He fixed the broken table.
translated: Il a réparé la table cassée.

original: She smoothed her hair.
translated: Elle s'est lissée les cheveux.

original: "Do you like traveling?" "Yes, I do."

original: Who are you trying to impress?

original: There are many red flowers in the garden.
translated: Il y a beaucoup de fleurs rouges dans le jardin.

original: Correct me if I am mistaken.
translated: Corrige-moi si je me trompe.

original: I didn't want to disturb Tom.

original: I'm bringing home a pizza.
translated: Je suis en train de ramener une pizza à la maison.

original: Until when will you stay in Japan?

original: You will go to school.
translated: Tu iras à l'école.

original: Tom has an American accent.
translated: Tom a un accent américain.

original: The political scandal was brought to light by two journalists.
translated: Le scandale politique a été mis au jour par deux journalistes.

original: Check your hat.
translated: Vérifie ton chapeau.

original: Have you been working there for long?

original: We're not home.
translated: Nous ne sommes pas à la maison.

original: Are you sending Christmas cards this year?

original: The economy is in turmoil once again.

original: You're smashed.

original: She has a very good figure.
translated: Elle a une très jolie silhouette.

original: You're not upset, are you?

original: And now you wish perhaps to learn on less familiar traps?

original: I poured myself a glass of whisky.
translated: Je me versai un verre de whisky.

original: The storm raged for a few days.
translated: La tempête fit rage durant quelques jours.

original: I must go alone.
translated: Je dois y aller seul.

original: You can't put off doing that any longer.

original: Tom seems to be contributing.

original: I can no more swim than a fish can walk.
translated: Je ne sais pas plus nager qu'un poisson sait marcher.

original: Tom said that he was very sad.

original: Do it again!

original: She met her uncle at the shop.
translated: Elle rencontra son oncle dans le magasin.

original: We haven't found the gun yet.

original: She's wearing high heels.

original: She became pale and flushed by turns.
translated: Elle pâlissait et rougissait tour à tour.

original: She wept with emotion.

original: Our school has about one thousand students.

original: I'm not very good at it.

original: Mary's sister is shy and awkward.
translated: La sœur de Marie est timide et maladroite.

original: I wish to stay alone for a couple of hours.
translated: Je veux rester seul pour quelques heures.

original: I'd like to be friends.

original: I looked directly into his eyes.

original: He wrote it down so as not to forget it.

original: Tom saw us.

original: I know she is in France.

original: I don't believe it was an accident.

original: Is everything ready?

original: I think you know that.
translated: Je pense que vous savez cela.

original: She was livid when she found out all the lies he'd told her.
translated: Elle était livide lorsqu'elle découvrit tous les mensonges qu'il lui avait racontés.

original: Tom knows what he's doing.

original: The king ruled his kingdom justly.
translated: Le roi régnait sur son royaume avec justice.

original: I was not sure what to do.
translated: Je n'étais pas sûre de savoir quoi faire.

original: I knew you'd be mad.

original: You're out of it.

original: It is your constant efforts that count most in the end.

original: We received an eviction notice.

original: Are you afraid?

original: It is a pity that he can't come.

original: At the entrance of a Japanese house, visitors are generally asked to take off their shoes.
translated: À l'entrée d'une maison japonaise, les visiteurs sont en général invités à se déchausser.

original: Have you ever had a long distance relationship?

original: Kiss Tom.

original: Pick a number.

original: They asked for his advice.

original: Tom knows it was a mistake.

original: They're drunk.
translated: Ils sont saouls.

original: Nothing is as terrible as losing someone you love in the world.

original: They became more and more nervous.

original: I can't even remember my own name.

original: My dear!

original: She's done her homework.

original: I have no further questions.

original: It's too bad that I don't need to lose weight.

original: I want you to get your own place.

original: I'm taking you to school.

original: Miela started to cry when her teachers came.

original: It's cloyingly sweet!

original: I never really wanted to do that.

original: You have to stay fit.

original: Do you play any sports?

original: They didn't see anything.

original: Get up and dance with us.
translated: Lève-toi et danse avec nous.

original: I wasn't invited to the opening ceremony.
translated: Je ne fus pas invité à la cérémonie d'ouverture.

original: Don't lose heart.

original: We're not staying.

original: The teacher welcomed the new students.
translated: Le professeur a accueilli les nouveaux élèves.

original: She didn't want to sell the book.

original: I don't want to fight.

original: Tom joined the army.
translated: Tom a rejoint l'armée.

original: Why are monkeys so funny?
translated: Pourquoi les singes sont-ils si amusants ?

original: Describe her.

original: You know what I found.

original: Tom talks too fast.

original: I'm trying to figure out what you do for fun.

original: You have gone too far this time.

original: I didn't know you were a member.

original: Our parents should be taken care of.

original: He is a good singer.
translated: C'est un bon chanteur.

original: I prefer apples to oranges.
translated: Je préfère les pommes aux oranges.

original: They don't have a car.

original: Do you speak Serbian?

original: I figured something was up.
translated: Je me suis imaginé que quelque chose se tramait.

original: Leg it!

original: This is my favorite pair of shoes.
translated: C'est ma paire de chaussures préférée.

original: This is a good movie.
translated: C'est un bon film.

original: I thought that Tom would say that.
translated: Je pensais que Tom aurait dit cela.

original: Can I speak to the head nurse?

original: This mountain is difficult to climb.
translated: Cette montagne est difficile à escalader.

original: We take particular pride in providing efficient solutions.
translated: Nous mettons un point d'honneur à fournir des solutions efficaces.

original: You're the most beautiful girl in the world.
translated: Vous êtes la plus belle fille du monde.

original: We were all disgusted.

original: It's late.
translated: Il est tard.

original: Sami didn't report the incident to the police.
translated: Sami n'a pas signalé l'incident à la police.

translated: Il a emprunté beaucoup d'argent de la banque.

original: Tom helped Mary with her luggage.
translated: Tom a aidé Mary avec ses bagages.

original: Some people don't go to a doctor because they can't afford to.
translated: Certaines personnes ne vont pas chez le médecin car ils ne peuvent pas se le permettre.

original: We should've taken the schedule into consideration.
translated: Nous aurions dû prendre en compte les horaires.

original: My financial worries are past.
translated: Mes soucis financiers sont terminés.

original: There's a rumor that Mary likes Tom.

original: This is a post office and that is a bank.
translated: Ceci est une poste et cela est une banque.

original: We have the opportunity to make some changes.

original: Tom promised he'd go straight home.
translated: Tom a promis qu'il rentrerait directement à la maison.

original: You wouldn't dare.

original: The weather forecast is not reliable at all.

original: We heard the door close.

original: Tom is puzzled.
translated: Tom est intrigué.

original: I always wash my face with soap and water.
translated: Je me lave toujours le visage avec de l'eau et du savon.

original: He used a headache as an excuse for leaving early.
translated: Il a pris prétexte d’un mal de tête pour rentrer plus tôt.

original: There's a red candle on top of the bathroom sink.
translated: Il y a une bougie rouge au-dessus de l'évier de la salle-de-bains.

original: I love her all the more for her faults.

original: You're crazy!

original: It's easy to make and it's cheap.
translated: C'est facile à faire et c'est bon marché.

original: What is your address?

original: The reverse seems true.
translated: L'inverse semble vrai.

original: The house is built of red bricks.
translated: La maison est construite en briques rouges.

original: Please say yes.
translated: Je te prie de dire oui.

original: Why did you decide to affiliate yourself with Company A?
translated: Pourquoi avez-vous choisi de vous affilier à la compagnie A ?

original: Paramedics arrived on the scene within minutes.
translated: Les secours sont arrivés sur place en quelques minutes.

original: You really are nuts.

original: Someone has to pay the bill.

original: You're young and strong.

original: This is an epic fail.

original: I'm sure he didn't do that on purpose.

original: No one attacks me unpunished.

original: I want you to sing me a song.
translated: Je veux que tu me chantes une chanson.

original: I don't play games.
translated: Je ne joue pas.

original: All of us try to be what none of us couldn't be except when some of us were what the rest of us desired.
translated: Nous essayons tous d'être ce qu'aucun d'entre nous ne pourrait être, sauf quand certains d'entre nous seraient ce que le reste désirait.

original: I'm not sure about this.

original: Staff members only.
translated: Personnel uniquement.

original: Keep focused on your work.

original: Next to what the boss pulls in, your earnings are just laughably tiny.
translated: Ce que vous vous faites est de la roupie de sansonnet, comparé au salaire de la patronne.

original: Her father was a policeman.
translated: Son père était un policier.

original: Maria's hair is blond, although dyed and not natural.
translated: Maria a les cheveux blonds, quoique teints et non naturels.

original: I thought you'd been killed. I'm glad I was wrong.
translated: Je pensais que tu serais tuée. Je me réjouis d'avoir eu tort.

original: I want you to stay here longer.
translated: Je veux que tu restes ici plus longtemps.

original: I don't care much for coffee.
translated: Je n'aime pas trop le café.

original: Tom gets on my nerves.
translated: Tom me tape sur les nerfs.

original: I'm glad we didn't do that.
translated: Je suis contente que nous n'ayons pas fait cela.

original: I need a sharp knife.

original: He was knee-deep in snow.
translated: Il était dans la neige jusqu'aux genoux.

original: He is a man of noble birth.
translated: C'est un homme de famille noble.

original: Stop doing that.
translated: Arrête de faire ça !

original: I like to watch a baseball game.
translated: J'aime regarder une partie de baseball.

original: I have every reason to believe that he is innocent of the crime.

original: Have you ever seen a car accident?

original: Come on, it's easy.

original: Hug me.

original: Is the Loch Ness monster real or is it just an elaborate hoax?

original: They left at what time?

original: Most castles have a moat surrounding them.
translated: La plupart des châteaux sont entourés de douves.

original: Whose fault is it?

original: I saw the teacher walk across the street.
translated: Je vis l'instituteur traverser la rue.

original: I'd like to take this with me.
translated: J'aimerais prendre ça avec moi.

original: I knew you'd want to go with us.

original: The king lives inside his castle.
translated: Le roi vit à l'intérieur de son château.

original: He was rebuked for writing such a rough report.
translated: Il a été réprimandé pour avoir rédigé un rapport tellement rudimentaire.

original: I think I need to take a shower.

original: The richest man in the world cannot buy her love.
translated: L'homme le plus riche du monde ne peut acheter son amour.

original: Tom took something.

original: "Are you serious?" "I'm absolutely serious."

original: Try to look happy.
translated: Essaie d'avoir l'air heureux.

original: They don't talk about it.

original: I can do without his help.

original: They received a positive response.

original: I have a wooden back-scratcher whose tip is carved in the shape of a hand.

original: It is difficult for beginners to enjoy windsurfing.

original: I'm not so sure anymore.
translated: Je n'en suis plus aussi certain.

original: There are wounds that time does not heal.

original: But this did not stop him from using his mind and presenting his ideas at physics meetings around the world.
translated: Mais ça ne l'empêcha pas de se servir de son cerveau et de présenter ses idées à des congrès de physique dans le monde entier.

original: All the players were in position.
translated: Tous les joueurs étaient en position.

original: Our economy doesn't work as well or grow as fast when a few prosper at the expense of a growing middle class.
translated: Notre économie ne fonctionne pas aussi bien ou ne se développe pas aussi vite lorsque une minorité prospère au dépens d'une classe moyenne grandissante.

original: We are all convinced of his innocence.

original: They forgot to lock the door.

original: Is love just a game to you?

original: I'm constantly telling her to behave herself.

original: He is keen on science.

original: I've requested asylum.

original: What did you do to it?

original: Many native speakers of Japanese have trouble hearing the difference between B and V.

original: I've never been there myself.

original: Can't anything be done?

original: Are the rumors true?

original: "Are you Swedish?" "No, Swiss."
translated: « Vous êtes suédois ? » « Non, suisse. »

original: You should protect your eyes from direct sunlight.
translated: Tu devrais te protéger les yeux de la lumière directe du soleil.

original: No artist's studio is complete without an unfinished painting resting on an easel.
translated: Aucun atelier d'artiste n'est complet sans un tableau inachevé reposant sur un chevalet.

original: This tire is punctured.
translated: Ce pneu est crevé.

original: Sami and Layla were leaving.
translated: Sami et Layla partaient.

original: So, you're not too bored?

original: We'll be there.
translated: Nous y serons.

original: She spends her evenings in front of her laptop.
translated: Elle passe ses soirées face à son ordinateur portable.

original: It's a rumor.
translated: C'est une rumeur.

original: Who are you?
translated: Qui êtes-vous ?

original: Tom ran away.
translated: Tom s'est enfui.

original: I just have to do something.

original: There is no salt left.
translated: Il n'y a plus de sel.

original: That's the worst thing you can do!

original: Tom apparently disagrees.
translated: Tom n'est apparemment pas d'accord.

original: We need you.

original: My arm hurts.
translated: J'ai une douleur dans mon bras.

original: Kill that cat.

original: Mary gave him ten euros.
translated: Marie lui a donné dix euros.

original: Do fertilizers contain phosphorus?

original: Do you have a Christmas vacation in Japan?

original: This is the deepest lake of Japan.

original: I feel a little tired.

original: What are you getting so upset about?

original: Tom said you would understand.

original: Six were invited, including the boy.

original: I want you to put in a good word for me.

original: I'm a university student.

original: These flowers grow in warm countries.

original: She has very short hair.

original: I'll miss this place once I leave.

original: I helped you when you needed help.
translated: Je t'ai aidé quand tu avais besoin d'aide.

original: Do you want this room painted, too?

original: You'll have a rough time.

original: I was ready today.

original: Have some.

original: I feel like a million bucks.

original: I want very much for you to understand.

original: Rubén is the father of three children.
translated: Rubén est père de trois enfants.

original: Who is this woman?

original: Get out if you can.

original: The power has been cut off since this morning.

original: Do you want some of these fries?

original: Tom is going to investigate.

original: You should have woken me up.

original: We can't go.

original: Where's the nearest post office?

original: Don't you think that all our politicians are too old?

original: I want to settle down.

original: I don't often ask questions.

original: Get lost.

original: This mysterious catastrophe dismayed the whole village.
translated: Cette catastrophe mystérieuse consterna tout le village.

original: Sami wanted to send his daughter on a vacation.
translated: Sami voulait envoyer sa fille en vacances.

original: He's keen on sports.
translated: Il est féru de sport.

original: This coffee is very strong.
translated: Ce café est très fort.

original: I asked her if he liked Chinese food.
translated: Je lui ai demandé s'il aimait la cuisine chinoise.

original: My name is Andrea.

original: It's important to know one's limits.
translated: Il est important de connaître ses propres limites.

original: I'm an alcoholic. I'm a drug addict. I'm homosexual. I'm a genius.

original: Hunting is forbidden in national parks.

original: Look at the girl whose hair is long.

original: Don't your neighbors ever complain?

original: That's the most important thing to do at this time.

original: Tom's house is very big.

original: His toupee looks like a dead cat.

original: We didn't have to do that, but we wanted to.

original: Maybe it'll snow.

original: You must go with me.

original: Dinner smells delicious.

original: He's a typical Japanese man.

original: The book you're looking for is on my desk.

original: They have to brush their teeth.

original: He is English.

original: We can work on it.

original: I cannot respond to your request.

original: These are the bluest blueberries I have ever seen. They're almost unnaturally blue.
translated: Ce sont les myrtilles les plus bleues que j'ai jamais vues. Elles sont d'un bleu quasi surnaturel.

original: The tomato is a nightshade.

original: I feel safe with you.

original: Bingley likes your sister undoubtedly; but he may never do more than like her, if she does not help him on.
translated: Votre sœur plaît à M. Bingley, sur cela il ne peut y avoir de doutes; mais il est bien possible qu’il en demeure là, à moins qu’elle ne l’aide un peu.

original: Pull over here.

original: What do you think this is made of?

original: I'm waiting for a reply.

original: Poets often compare death to sleep.

original: I will not tolerate fighting in my class.

original: Does Tom smoke?

original: They hoped to sell the stocks at even higher prices.
translated: Ils espéraient vendre les actions à des prix encore plus élevés.

original: The sky has become clear.

original: We don't have any proof.

original: Will you join us for a swim?

original: That's fortunate.

original: Tom and Mary left Boston at the end of October.
translated: Tom et Mary quittèrent Boston à la fin d'octobre.

original: Keep an eye on him.

original: Why did she believe that?

translated: Tom est un avocat spécialisé dans le divorce.

original: Are you sure you don't want to keep it?

original: He said that he was very shocked.

original: He ran to his mother in the library.
translated: Il courut vers sa mère dans la bibliothèque.

original: Better to err on the side of caution.

original: It was nothing less than a miracle.

original: I made it myself.

original: He had an operation on his left leg.

original: She's not answering the phone either.

original: I don't enjoy singing in public.

original: She has a nice face.

original: Dan was downstairs watching TV on the sofa.

original: I really like this singer.

original: I don't want you to drive my car.

original: Tie him to a tree.
translated: Attachez-le à un arbre.

original: It has been many years since she died.
translated: Elle est décédée il y a tant d'années !

original: The laws of a land embody the spirit of its people.

original: He could no longer contain his anger.
translated: Il ne pouvait contenir sa colère plus longtemps.

original: I'm in the basement.

original: I just came up with the word.

original: Many poets equate death with sleep.

original: Tom said it was his fault.

original: I lost that argument.
translated: J'ai perdu cette joute verbale.

original: My bag is very heavy.

original: Are you sure you want to leave without saying goodbye?

original: She gave him all the money that she had.

original: The vault's already open.

original: Tom has a new girlfriend.

original: We have to finish this.

original: I like this one even better.

original: Tom felt foolish.

original: It sounds a bit goofy.

original: He told me that he's lonely.

original: I want to discuss this with your manager.

original: Had I known her address, I would have written to her.

original: I'm a natural blonde.

original: No one likes to lose.

original: Queen Elizabeth I passed away in 1603.

original: Sami refused to talk.

original: They came back last Wednesday.

original: Tom says you're a genius.

original: The answer is 42.

original: You need a license to drive a car.

original: Do you do this often?

original: After the earthquake, the land value in this area went down a lot.
translated: Après le tremblement de terre, la valeur des terrains dans cette région a beaucoup diminué.

original: I visited the town for the first time in a long time.
translated: J'ai visité la ville pour la première fois depuis longtemps.

original: It is just nine by my watch.
translated: Il est pile neuf heures à ma montre.

original: Who's my teacher?

original: Does he want to look at it?

original: He's as dumb as a rock.
translated: Il est bête comme ses pieds.

original: He acted fairly towards me.
translated: Il a été correct avec moi.

original: He died suddenly.
translated: Il mourut soudainement.

original: Do you fancy a drink?

original: Textile News has a large following among those working in the textile industry.
translated: La Gazette du Textile a une grande audience auprès des travailleurs du secteur.

original: My father doesn't allow me to go out with Bill.
translated: Mon père ne m'autorise pas à sortir avec Bill.

original: They're all mine.

original: Do it this way!

original: She wrote to him to tell him how wonderful he was.
translated: Elle lui a écrit pour lui dire combien il était merveilleux.

original: She is partial to chocolate cake.
translated: Elle a un faible pour les gâteaux au chocolat.

translated: Les scientifiques les plus prolifiques sont ceux qui formulent les bonnes questions.

original: Ziri stayed.

translated: Ils sont accoutumés au climat humide de l'été.

original: You can't do it by yourself.
translated: Vous ne pouvez pas le faire par vos propres moyens.

original: Tom didn't go to the lake last summer.
translated: Tom n'est pas allé au lac, l'été dernier.

original: Stars can be seen clearly in this area.
translated: On peut clairement voir les étoiles à cet endroit.

original: She, with such a sweet and pure figure, killed herself while cursing both of our names.
translated: Elle, à la figure tellement douce et pure, s'est sabordée en écorchant nos deux noms.

original: Here's the money I owe you.

original: You needn't have hurried; you've arrived too early.

original: I'm sorry I'm late replying to your email.
translated: Je suis désolé de répondre tardivement à votre e-mail.

original: I was tired today.

original: The baby is teething now.

original: To the best of my knowledge, this is the only translation available.
translated: Pour autant que je sache, c'est l'unique traduction.

original: I finally got a driver's license.
translated: J'ai finalement obtenu le permis de conduire.

original: Try to eat a little more.
translated: Essayez de manger un peu plus.

original: Please bring me a menu.
translated: Apportez-moi le menu, s'il vous plaît !

original: I've never seen anything like this.
translated: Jamais je n'ai vu quoi que ce soit de tel.

original: Adjust your tie.
translated: Ajustez votre cravate !

original: Mary is not used to being made fun of.
translated: Marie n'est pas habituée à être ridiculisée.

original: The steamer is now out of sight.
translated: Le bateau à vapeur est maintenant hors de vue.

original: Give me my money.
translated: Donnez-moi mon argent.

original: Mary milks her cows morning and evening.
translated: Marie trait ses vaches matin et soir.

original: You'd better wear a sweater under your jacket.
translated: Vous feriez mieux de porter un pull sous votre veste.

original: I think Tom is likely to go to Boston in the near future.
translated: Selon moi, il est probable que Tom aille à Boston dans un avenir proche.

original: Record the broadcast on tape.
translated: Enregistrez l'émission sur une bande magnétique.

original: We looked into it.
translated: On y a jeté un œil.

original: Just give me what I want.
translated: Donne-moi juste ce que je veux.

original: Can you light the way?
translated: Peux-tu éclairer le passage ?

original: Television is ruining family life.
translated: La télévision détruit la vie de la famille.

original: He can't sing.
translated: Il est incapable de chanter.

original: It wasn't exactly what I wanted, but I bought it anyway.
translated: Ce n'est pas exactement ce que je voulais, mais je l'ai acheté malgré tout.

original: He lost his reason when he saw his house burn down.
translated: Il perdit la raison quand il vit sa maison détruite par le feu.

original: He was famous for his marathon speeches in parliament.
translated: Il était célèbre pour ses discours fleuves au Parlement.

original: I won't tell anybody.
translated: Je ne le dirai à personne.

original: It was hard for him to live on his small pension.
translated: Vivre avec une faible pension de retraite lui est difficile.

original: Tom loves partying.
translated: Tom adore faire la fête.

original: I'll tell him that.
translated: Je lui dirai ça.

original: She insisted that he should stay where he was.
translated: Elle insista pour qu'il reste où il était.

original: For nothing is so beautiful but that it betrays some defect on close inspection.
translated: Car il n'est rien de tellement beau qui ne montre des défauts lorsque soumis à une inspection minutieuse.

original: He doesn't come here every day.
translated: Il ne vient pas ici tous les jours.

original: He was very tired, so he went to bed early.
translated: Il était très fatigué, c'est pour cela qu'il est allé au lit tôt.

original: He made it.
translated: Il a réussi.

original: We moved into this house last month, but we still haven't settled down.
translated: Nous avons emménagé dans cette maison le mois dernier, mais nous ne sommes pas encore installés.

original: The students seem to be sleepy today.
translated: Les élèves ont l'air endormis, aujourd'hui.

original: If I'd taken time to brush my teeth after breakfast, I would've missed my bus.
translated: Si j'avais pris le temps de me brosser les dents après le petit-déjeuner, j'aurais raté mon bus.

original: Shouldn't you be at school now?
translated: Ne devrais-tu pas être à l'école en ce moment ?

original: I repeat it, and say that the world is but a flock of sheep.
translated: Je le répète, et dis, vaille que vaille, le monde n'est que franche moutonnaille.

original: Are you alone?
translated: Êtes-vous seule ?

original: I feel alive.
translated: Je me sens vivant.

original: Stop spending money on stupid things.
translated: Arrête de dépenser de l'argent en idioties !

original: Last night, I went to bed without brushing my teeth.
translated: Hier soir, je suis allée au lit sans me brosser les dents.

original: You're up late.
translated: Tu es debout tard.

original: The battery of my MP3-player was empty.
translated: La batterie de mon lecteur MP3 était vide.

original: We helped her.
translated: Nous l'avons aidée.

original: I don't yet know what we're supposed to do.
translated: Je ne sais pas encore ce que nous sommes supposées faire.
